character.name: Hotel
description: A trained assasin. Leans heavy on <c=keyword>attacks</c>, and makes use of <c=keyword>autododge</c> to avoid incoming fire at the last second.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.description: All non-attack actions are negated. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

Reflex.name: Reflex
Reflex.description: Gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c> at the start of your turn. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 each turn.</c>

Megaphone.name: MEGAPHONE
Megaphone.description: Prevent the first time you would gain <c=status>SILENCE</c> each turn.

Spice.name: SPICE
Spice.description: Lose 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE</c> at the start of each turn, instead of all of it.

Silencer.name: SILENCER
Silencer.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Every turn, after playing 3 cards, gain 1 <c=status>SILENCE</c> if you have none</c>

Contract.name: CONTRACT
Contract.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Lose 2 <c=status>SHIELD</c> at the start of every turn.</c>

Stimulants.name: STIMULANTS
Stimulants.description: All cards that cost 2+ energy cost 1 less energy. <c=downside>Gain 1 less <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn.</c>
